about_the_game: Customize your truck with a choice of dark and scary paint jobs! Halloween is a great time to be different and make your truck stand out against the usual serious business look of vehicles found on the roads today. These spine-chilling paint schemes are in fact perfectly good for use all year round - if you are into it!
detailed_description:
Just Updated

Added a spooky trailer paint job!


About the Game

Customize your truck with a choice of dark and scary paint jobs! Halloween is a great time to be different and make your truck stand out against the usual serious business look of vehicles found on the roads today. These spine-chilling paint schemes are in fact perfectly good for use all year round - if you are into it!
